 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיּוּן‎</span> **noun masculine** ==sign-post, monument== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיֵּין‎</span> Pi\`el denominative); probably from √ in original physical sense, see especially Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Hom. Wurz. 57</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii 1, 154</sup>; &gt; √<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צין‎</span> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]].); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span>, grave-stone [[2Kgs.23.17|2Kgs 23:17]] sign-post [[Ezek.39.15|Ezek 39:15]] guide-posts, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיֻּנִים‎</span> [[Jer.31.21|Jer 31:21]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְרוּרִים‎</span>).
